Overview:

Dr. Wayne Wyatt and Wyatt Orthodontics in Tulsa, OK, are looking for a motivated Orthodontist to join their team. This is a rare opportunity to receive mentorship from a highly esteemed Owner Dentist and potentially partner and ultimately buy into their practice.

The Practice
Serving the Tulsa, Claremore, and Sand Springs communities since 2003, Wyatt Orthodontics has been providing stunning smiles with the choices of Invisalign, Braces, or other orthodontic care. Over half of the staff has been with Dr. Wyatt since day one - nearly 20 years working as a team! With a five-star rating and over 325 google reviews, high earning potential, as well as buy-in potential, this is a unique opportunity, and Dr. Wyatt is only looking for the best. The practices offer a beautiful work environment, as well as the latest in orthodontic materials and technology.

Wyatt Orthodontics is a partner of MB2 Dental, a growing Dental Partnership Organization (DPO) with over 300 practices across 31 states. At MB2 Dental, we help you combine the benefits of partnering with a larger organization, like shared services and access to capital, with the independence and autonomy you love about owning a practice. Unlike your traditional DSO model, our Owners maintain complete control and clinical autonomy as they continue to run their practices as they see fit. Doctors are responsible for local leadership and clinical care delivery, while MB2 handles all non-clinical tasks, so our doctors can focus on patient care. This is the perfect buy-in opportunity for any dentist interested in joining a community of doctors who invest in other dentist partners to maximize financial growth.

Overview:

The Practice
Serving the Tulsa, Claremore, and Sand Springs communities since 2003, Wyatt Orthodontics has been providing stunning smiles with the choices of Invisalign, Braces, or other orthodontic care. Over half of the staff has been with Dr. Wyatt since day one - nearly 20 years working as a team! With a five-star rating and over 325 google reviews, high earning potential, as well as buy-in potential, this is a unique opportunity, and Dr. Wyatt is only looking for the best. The practices offer a beautiful work environment, as well as the latest in orthodontic materials and technology.

Wyatt Orthodontics is a partner of MB2 Dental, a growing Dental Partnership Organization (DPO) with over 300 practices across 31 states. At MB2 Dental, we help you combine the benefits of partnering with a larger organization, like shared services and access to capital, with the independence and autonomy you love about owning a practice. Unlike your traditional DSO model, our Owners maintain complete control and clinical autonomy as they continue to run their practices as they see fit. Doctors are responsible for local leadership and clinical care delivery, while MB2 handles all non-clinical tasks, so our doctors can focus on patient care. This is the perfect buy-in opportunity for any dentist interested in joining a community of doctors who invest in other dentist partners to maximize financial growth.
